price: 在他们之前，我毁灭了许多比他们更强悍的世代！他们曾在各地旅行，难道有什么避死的地方吗？
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum baṭshan fanaqqabū fī al-bilādi hal min maḥīṣin
